event

Interface IRCRawEventListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    IRCChannelImpl, IRCClientImpl, IRCRawEventAdapter, IRCRawEventDispatcher, IRCUserImpl

    public interface IRCRawEventListener

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onCommandReply(int replyNumber, java.util.List<java.lang.String> parameters)
      This method is called when the server repliesto a command (200-399).
      void onConnectionReply(int replyNumber, java.util.List<java.lang.String> parameters)
      This method is called when the server replies with a connection related reply (000-099).
      void onJoin(java.lang.String nickname, java.lang.String channelName)
      This method is called when the user with that nickname joins the channel with that channelName.
      void onMessage(java.lang.String sender, java.lang.String msgtarget, java.lang.String message)
      This method is called when a message has been sent.
      void onMode(java.lang.String name, java.util.List<IRCModeAction> modeActions)
      This method is called when the modes of an user or channel have been changed.
      void onNick(java.lang.String prevFullUsername, java.lang.String newNickname)
      This method is called when user with prevFullUsername has changed it's nickname to newNickname.
      void onNotice(java.lang.String target, java.lang.String message)
      This method is called when a NOTICE has been sent to a target.
      void onPart(java.lang.String nickname, java.lang.String channelName, java.lang.String message)
      This method is called when the user with that nickname leaves the channel with that channelName with optional an message.
      void onPing(java.lang.String server)
      This method is called when the server sends a PING command.

    • Method Detail

      • onPing

        void onPing(java.lang.String server)
        This method is called when the server sends a PING command.
        Parameters:
        server - Server that sent the PING.
        Throws:
        {@link - IllegalArgumentException} If server is null.

      • onNick

        void onNick(java.lang.String prevFullUsername,
            java.lang.String newNickname)
        This method is called when user with prevFullUsername has changed it's nickname to newNickname.
        Parameters:
        prevFullUsername - Full username of the user that has changed its nickname.
        newNickname - The new nickname of the user.
        Throws:
        {@link - IllegalArgumentException} If any of the arguments is null.

      • onNotice

        void onNotice(java.lang.String target,
              java.lang.String message)
        This method is called when a NOTICE has been sent to a target.
        Parameters:
        target - target of the notice.
        message - Message of the notice.
        Throws:
        {@link - IllegalArgumentException} If any of the arguments is null.

      • onJoin

        void onJoin(java.lang.String nickname,
            java.lang.String channelName)
        This method is called when the user with that nickname joins the channel with that channelName.
        Parameters:
        nickname - Nickname of the user that joined the channel.
        channel - Name of the channel being joined by the user.
        Throws:
        {@link - IllegalArgumentException} If any of the arguments is null.

      • onPart

        void onPart(java.lang.String nickname,
            java.lang.String channelName,
            java.lang.String message)
        This method is called when the user with that nickname leaves the channel with that channelName with optional an message.
        Parameters:
        nickname - Nickname of the user that leaves the channel.
        channel - Name of the channel being left by the user.
        message - Optional message written by the user that is leaving.
        Throws:
        {@link - IllegalArgumentException} If any of the arguments except message is null.

      • onMode

        void onMode(java.lang.String name,
            java.util.List<IRCModeAction> modeActions)
        This method is called when the modes of an user or channel have been changed.
        Parameters:
        name - Nickname of the user or name of the channel that has changed modes.
        modeActions - Mode changes of the user or channel.
        Throws:
        {@link - IllegalArgumentException} If any of the arguments is null.

      • onMessage

        void onMessage(java.lang.String sender,
               java.lang.String msgtarget,
               java.lang.String message)
        This method is called when a message has been sent.
        Parameters:
        sender - Sender of the message.
        msgtarget - Target of the message. Either the client or any of its channels.
        message - Message being sent.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If any of the arguments is null.

      • onConnectionReply

        void onConnectionReply(int replyNumber,
                       java.util.List<java.lang.String> parameters)
        This method is called when the server replies with a connection related reply (000-099).
        Parameters:
        replyNumber - Number of the reply.
        parameters - Parameters of the reply.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If parameters is null.

      • onCommandReply

        void onCommandReply(int replyNumber,
                    java.util.List<java.lang.String> parameters)
        This method is called when the server repliesto a command (200-399).
        Parameters:
        replyNumber - Number of the reply.
        parameters - Parameters of the reply.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If parameters is null.
